ygData.subject: Re: Guide to Wizardry
ygData.msgSnippet: Tunare server, but thanks for the thought. :-) An Enchanter I group with often is up to 11th now, and Im hoping he ll be able to turn out some things. All he
ygData.messageBody:
Tunare server, but thanks for the thought. :-)

An Enchanter I group with often is up to 11th now, and Im hoping he'll be able to turn out some things. All he can do is +2 rings currently, and Im not sure if its worth the money, or if I should wait, hoarde, and buy something REALLY good, rather than babystep upgrade. Theres a 57plat ring at the mages building in Freeport that Id like, and Im only 5 gold away from buying it, buuut I have to keep in mind buying my level 16 spells too.

Normally I dont merchant, I scrounge beetle eyes noone wants and I do things the Do-Unto-Others system, so I do favors and hope others are nice in return. Ive gotten a nearly complete suit of silk, the rings I mentioned, the amulet, and a blackened wand (15 magic resistance) and given out gifts of pelts and various items I came across. But you dont get a lot of cash this way.

Wavering on if I should turn into a miser or deal with breaking even. :D Some people charge for Binds, some dont, and I can bind now. :z

At what level do you tend to start going to pick up nice magic user items? Most quests that grant such things seem geared for lvl 30 and up.

Shannyn

>>> <marvin@...> 09/27/99 10:53AM >>>
From: <marvin@...>

On Mon, 27 Sep 1999, PHAEDRA WHITLOCK wrote:
> Human wiz, Int 95. I just yesterday was given a +3 Int amulet, so 98.
> I hear 100 is THE magic number... Found that out at level 2. :( Wisdom
> 75 Agi 90 dex 80 (base stats). Two +2 dex Dervish rings and a +5 hp
> ring.

95 isn't too bad....you can up that with jewlry for not too much coin and
100 is the magic number, though for us the higher the better... Thoguh
don't dispare too much, that 90 agi and 80 dex will come in handy....the
critters can't interupt you when they can't hit you, and dex comes into
play when you do get hit and try to continue casting..and int jewlery is
one of the cheaper kinds...i missed what server your on, but if your on
Innoruuk give me a tell and i'll hook you up with some +int rings for
real cheap

Stannis Starslyder
Wizard of the Moon
Innoruuk
